name: market for light commercial vehicle | light commercial vehicle | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8578/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'light commercial vehicle', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This product is a mobile infrastructure that is used in the service of transportation. The production of light commercial vehicle is based of the Golf A4. Its life time performance is assumed to be 239,000 pkm.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'light commercial vehicle',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'light commercial vehicle',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
